title: Hardware requirements for deployment option 1: SMA only
content:
The SMA capability is mandatory for all deployment options. If you plan to use deployment option 1 (which includes SMA only), plan your hardware resources as follows.

Decide your SMA deployment size

Decide your SMA deployment size according to the SMA size definitions. 

Plan the hardware resources

Use the following table to plan the required hardware resources.

In this release, support for AlloyDB Omni is under controlled availability. Please contact our product management team before you begin the implementation in your production environment.
